articles.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq raises even more than expected, hits $6.9B valuation
articles.description: The fresh raise comes in above the rumored numbers when word leaked in July that it was raising.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Eric Baker’s long, winding road to taking StubHub public
articles.description: Although StubHub's shares fell 6% in first day of trading, the IPO is testament to the co-founder's 25-year effort.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Irregular raises $80 million to secure frontier AI models
articles.description: Irregular, the AI security startup, now has a valuation of $450 million, a source close to the deal told TechCrunch.
articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: Tesla is redesigning its door handles following safety probe, Bloomberg investigation
articles.description: Chief designer Franz von Holzhausen said Wednesday that the company is "working on" combining the electronic and manual door releases after owners
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Kleiner Perkins-backed voice AI startup Keplar aims to replace traditional market research
articles.description: The two-year-old startup raised a $3.2 million seed round led by Kleiner Perkins.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Meet Macroscope: an AI tool for understanding your code base, fixing bugs
articles.description: On Wednesday, former Twitter head of product Kayvon Beykpour announced the launch of Macroscope, an AI system aimed at developers and product leaders
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: China tells its tech companies they can’t buy AI chips from Nivida
articles.description: After strongly discouraging tech companies from buying Nivdia's AI chips in August, the country is now banning the practice outright.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: The iPhone Air’s real breakthrough is its battery
articles.description: Apple's slimmest iPhone uses a "revolutionary" battery design that allows the cell to fill more space within the device, boosting overall energy
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Zoom launches a cross application AI notetaker, AI avatars and more in its latest update
articles.description: Zoom is launching new tools for its meeting and productivity platform including new AI avatars that would resemble users.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Jaguar Land Rover to pause production for third week due to cyberattack
articles.description: The company owned by Tata Motors is estimated to be losing millions of pounds a week due to the shutdown.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Airbuds is the music social network Apple and Spotify wish they had built
articles.description: Airbuds, a music social app aimed at Gen Z, raises $5M as the app reaches 5 million monthly users.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: AI and the Future of Defense: Mach Industries’ Ethan Thornton at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
articles.description: Ethan Thornton, CEO of Mach Industries, joins the AI Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 (Oct. 27–29, San Francisco) to discuss how AI is transforming
articles.author: TechCrunch Events

articles.title: Google revamps Discover page to show content from creators
articles.description: Google will now let you follow publishers and creators directly through its Search app's Discover page.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: From Startup Battlefield to the Disrupt Stage: Discord founder Jason Citron returns to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

articles.author: TechCrunch Events

articles.title: Amazon launches AI agent to help sellers complete tasks and manage their businesses
articles.description: The company is updating Seller Assistant, its AI tool for third-party sellers, to help handle tasks on the seller's behalf.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: VC firm Insight Partners says thousands of staff and limited partners had personal data stolen in a ransomware attack
articles.description: The venture capital giant, behind cyber giants Wiz and Databricks, notified current and former employees, as well as the firm's limited partners,
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: Groww, backed by Satya Nadella, set to become first Indian startup to go public after U.S.-to-India move
articles.description: Groww's listing — expected later this year — is set to double as a major cash-out moment for global venture funds.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
